entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
